title: NewsTab: Smart RSS Reader
description:
NewsTab is a smart RSS reader (NewsReader) that finds the best stories in the news feeds you follow. Its the perfect way to follow your daily news and google alerts!
Add any RSS feed, news site, blog, Google News topic, Google Alert or Twitter hashtag. Simply find your favorite news sources in over 130 regions and languages (local news, world news) and organize your news by interest. Get smart news feed with the best of everything you follow, daily news digest, and breaking news notifications.
Tired of juggling between news apps to get your daily news? Breaking news get lost on your Facebook timeline?
Get all your news in one beautiful newsreader! A smart rss feed reader to follow all your daily news and google alerts!
Key features:
•	Smart surfacing of trending stories from your favorite news sources
•	Beautiful, intuitive and fun to use.
•	Easily find top local news, world news and international publications in over 130 regions worldwide
•	Follow any news topic (powered by Google News and Google Alerts).
•	Instant article load experience and full story reader mode with “Simplified Article” view
•	Daily news digest showing the best stories in your feeds with full stories you can read even when offline (subway, plane etc.)
•	Syncs across all your devices and platforms
•	Follow social feeds and hashtags on Twitter
•	Offline, read later functionality
•	Simple OPML Import from RSS Readers and RSS services, such as Feedly and Inoreader
•	Share to popular “save for later” apps such as Pocket, Instapaper, Readability, Evernote and OneNote
•	Beautiful news widget
•	Supports video news and podcasts
Organize your news:
NewsTab is a single place to read and share the news you care about from the publications you love (global & local). Simply find world news, international news and local news sources. Follow popular news topics (Headlines, Sports, Technology, Entertainment etc.) or create your own with Google News topics and Google alerts.
Smart RSS reader:
NewsTab is a smart news reader. It shows the best stories in your feeds based on various signals, such as trends in social networks, popularity on NewsTab and coverage on various news sources. The more you use NewsTab, the smarter it gets. It will better identify your interest and serve more relevant stories.
Beautiful & visual:
NewsTab is a beautiful newsreader, designed for enjoyable browsing of your favorite news sources with a visual, image reach, experience. It combines the flexibility of open RSS readers such as Feedly or (the late) Google Reader, with the intuitive and visual experience of modern news apps, such as Flipboard, Apple News and NewsRepublic.
Follow any news source or news topic:
With NewsTab you can easily follow any news topic, publisher or RSS feed, as well as any news topic via simple integration with Google News and Google Alert. You can also add your Twitter account to follow your Twitter timeline, any Twitter user or twitter hashtags.
Daily digest and offline editions:
Every day, you’ll get a daily news digest, featuring the best of everything you follow on NewsTab. It’s a beautiful offline edition, with zero load time and full article view, so you can read without relying on internet connection (when in subway, plane etc.). You can subscribe to more digests, for any news category or even a specific news source. Think of it as a paper news edition, delivered right into your door front.
Perfect for international readers and expats:
For those of you who are following international news, we’ve built a powerful news catalog and RSS search engine, indexing millions of news feeds from top global magazines and local newspapers, in over 130 countries & languages. Top regions include US news, India news, Brazil news, Japanese news, German news and many more. Top languages include English news, Spanish news, Italian news, Portuguese news, Russian news and many more.
